title: 7 Days to Die Alpha 4 Multiplayer Crack x86 & x64 - V2
description:
----------------------------------------
7DaysToDie Alpha4

Cracked Multiplayer Version 2
----------------------------------------
                            By Mywk
----------------------------------------

This is a Multiplayer Crack for 7 Days to Die Alpha 4
Download the game from any other torrent as long as the version is Alpha4

Screenshot: www.bayimg.com/DaDleAAfH

Version 2.0 Changelog
- Fixed most problems with connection issues
- Fixed Server Browser not showing some cracked servers

Installing
- Open the folder with the same version as your game (x64 or x86).
- Drop the "Assembly-CSharp.dll" into "[Game Folder]/7DaysToDie_Data/Managed" and replace it. 

HowTo 
- After opening the game, write the Username and Password you would like to use, don't forget the password if you want to keep your username, there is no way to retrieve it. 
- Server list is a List of CRACKED servers, maintained by you guys. 

Making a server 
- When creating a server set it as "Public" and it will show up in the list. 

Info 
- If for some reason your server list doesn't update just restart the game, this happens quite often. 


How to play with your friends even if they can't connect to your server

- Download Evolve (or Tunngle/Hamachi), and all of you join the same network/room.
- Create the server and make sure your firewall/router are allowing the game (Default port: 25000)
- After, for your friends: Copy the Evolve/Tunngle/Hamachi IP and paste it in "Server Browser" where it says "Connect To" then click enter and Start.



Enjoy ;)
